intro: Ruprechtia scandens, commonly known as the climbing ruprechtia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its creeping stems that can climb or trail along the ground, often forming dense mats. Ruprechtia scandens is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as woodland floors or stream banks.
